titleStmt.title: Once more a warning to thee O England but more particularly to the inhabitants of the city of Bristol.
titleStmt.author: Dole, Dorcas.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. [18]: Dorcas Dole. Newgate Prison in Bristol, the 17th of the 9th month, 1683.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
